name: Coffee Break (itch) (Marty Starkiller (Twin Pines Soft))
description:
Made for the weekly game jam

instruction booklet coming soon

The game is an adventure RPG, your goal is to level up to defeat evil Kah-Feind and save the princess Delicaf meanwhile gathering all your stolen coffee bags from your dream coffee store you want to open from evil slimes (they don't look evil, but they sure are!)
